basic.Peptide Name: sHR2-1(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein heptad repeat)
basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein heptad repeat)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.15150417]SARS-CoV:inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50=43 ± 6.4 μM);murine coronavirus:inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50>50 μM).
